eventName: Come Catastrophes or Wakes of Vultures
storyInfo: The Blacksteel landship is approaching. The team's members notice multiple fires on the plate as they wait, and Jessica heads out on her own to the rescue.

attributes.content: Two weeks later...
Hey, Teacher's Pet? We've been waiting here for nearly a whole day already.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: You saw the news that the Messenger brought us from HQ, didn't you?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: They said the ETA is tomorrow afternoon.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: And also that we needed to spend the day before preparing everything needed for the connection.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: The Davistown connectors were working fine to start with. Laura got it all up and running in half a day, and now we're just standing around with our thumbs up our butts.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: If you're cold, you're free to use the tent we set up, or warm yourself by the fire.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: What if I'm not cold... what if I'm afraid?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Of what?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I don't know. I just... really can't tell how this whole thing will go down.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Liskarm brings her communicator to her ear, looking slightly impatient.
It's not receiving any signal. This proves that Fort Barron, known to Blacksteel's operators as 'the landship,' has yet to enter transmission range.
Not going to warm yourself up a little longer, Jessica?
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: I'll pass... It's almost dark. I'll feel cold regardless.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: You shouldn't worry too much. I mean, yeah, I'm real mad about the bank too, but the landship is almost here.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: The boss isn't about to let those banker bastards make a fool of us.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: ...Boss? Which boss?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Mr. Cliff, of course! Who else?
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: He...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: It's hard to say. I mean... in the end, he's a businessman.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Jessica silently looks in the direction of the platform. Instinctively, she reaches into her pouch and rubs the bullet inside.
Look over there... Is that a fire...?
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Where?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Right on the plate, close to the mining district... Maybe they started a fire by accident while heating themselves up—
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Hold on, no, there's not just one... Wh-What is this...
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Jessica?!
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: ...team, Blacksteel... ship estimated to... arrive in...
attributes.name: Communicator

attributes.content: Acknowledged.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Jessica, let everybody know—
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Captain, there are multiple distinct fires on the plate! I don't know what's going on, but I have to go check!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Why now of all times... But we've already got the signal from the landship. Fort Barron shouldn't be far—
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Jessica—Jessica! Where are you going?! Captain, what do we do?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Let her go. We'll continue the connection mission.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: ...What's with all the ruckus at this hour?
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Where's that noise coming from...
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Someone's pounding the plant?!
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Woodrow grabs his firearm from under his pillow and listens closely to the commotion downstairs.
Hurry up and get down here, Woody! Someone broke in!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Bleuch... Feels awful.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: If I'd known... I wouldn't have drank so much.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: I'm so tired. Maybe I'll just lie down here... That way, I'll freeze to death on the street by tomorrow for sure...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: What's that noise? What's going on?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: What the hell is this?!
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: R-Run... These people just... barged in... and started smashing and looting...
attributes.name: Blacksteel Engineering Team Member

attributes.content: Who are they?
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Huh... So it's you, gramps.
attributes.name: Hard-hearted Hoodlum

attributes.content: You're the one from the snowfield...
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: I'm a pretty lucky guy, gramps. Shh, don't make a fuss. You'll attract others.
attributes.name: Hard-hearted Hoodlum

attributes.content: You were real lucky too, getting away from me, but I wonder how long that luck will last.
attributes.name: Hard-hearted Hoodlum

attributes.content: Run! You can't take him on!
attributes.name: Blacksteel Engineering Team Member

attributes.content: So you're here too, old timer. Good, saves us the trouble of looking for you.
attributes.name: Rude Ruffian

attributes.content: What's going on, Helena? I figured you'd have knocked them all out by the time I got downstairs.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: ...They've gotten a lot more reckless. They've really gone nuts.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Hey now, no whispering. If you've got something nice to say, you can share it with the class.
attributes.name: Rude Ruffian

attributes.content: You ignorant brat...
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Those bullets must be real pricy, yeah? So expensive... you don't even have all six rounds loaded.
attributes.name: Rude Ruffian

attributes.content: What are you getting at?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Makes sense. There ain't a whole lot of materials you can use on this plate.
attributes.name: Rude Ruffian

attributes.content: I mean, if it weren't for that, how come you've been packing that piece every day for all these years, and I ain't never heard about nobody getting shot?
attributes.name: Rude Ruffian

attributes.content: My friends, these two bastards are well past their expiration date. Put 'em out of their misery, then help yourselves to whatever you find.
attributes.name: Rude Ruffian

attributes.content: What... What are you people doing?!
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Out of the way, boozehound.
attributes.name: Troublemaking Thug

attributes.content: Wh-Who gave you the right to... to make trouble here... Ugh...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Here, lemme treat you to another bottle. Now get some sleep.
attributes.name: Troublemaking Thug

attributes.content: Heh, nice one. Died as he lived, with a drink in his face.
attributes.name: Rabble-rousing Ruffian

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Troublemaking Thug

attributes.content: That's about everything there is to grab. Head to the next shop?
attributes.name: Rabble-rousing Ruffian

attributes.content: Are you okay, Leone? Let me help you up.
attributes.name: Panic-stricken Shop Proprietor

attributes.content: *sigh*... Those brats can be so cruel. Your face's all bloody...
attributes.name: Panic-stricken Shop Proprietor

attributes.content: I'm okay... Just a little dizzy...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Look at how they smashed the place up... It wasn't just the display windows?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Forget the windows... They cleaned out the whole store.
attributes.name: Panic-stricken Shop Proprietor

attributes.content: What the hell is going on tonight?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: We're short on time here, gramps. Quit it with the hide-and-seek.
attributes.name: Hard-hearted Hoodlum

attributes.content: You're here, aren't you?!
attributes.name: Guileful Gangster

attributes.content: What a pain. This place is so cluttered... No room to move at all...
attributes.name: Hard-hearted Hoodlum

attributes.content: Get out here already, you old bastard!
attributes.name: Guileful Gangster

attributes.content: Mmm...
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Heh, surprised you could dodge that with your leg. Guess I didn't give you enough credit. Let's see how long your luck's gonna hold out.
attributes.name: Hard-hearted Hoodlum

attributes.content: Gargh!
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Heh, got you!
attributes.name: Hard-hearted Hoodlum

attributes.content: Honestly, you're lucky to die in this stinking place. Suits you just perfectly.
attributes.name: Hard-hearted Hoodlum

attributes.content: *pant*... *pant*...
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: (Just a little more... Hang in there, old bones. It'll work... It'll definitely work.)
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Now I can finally say goodbye to you, old fart.
attributes.name: Hard-hearted Hoodlum

attributes.content: Not so fast...
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: It's over for you, punks.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: What's this... Steam?!
attributes.name: Guileful Gangster

attributes.content: It burns!
attributes.name: Hard-hearted Hoodlum

attributes.content: You're right, though. This stinking place is my home, so of course it's a great fit for me.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Phew... No one makes trouble in my house.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Nngh...
attributes.name: Hard-hearted Hoodlum

attributes.content: You asked for this.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: You're right. It's not fully loaded, and it took quite a bit of trouble to get these to fire in my gun.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Which is why... I ain't wasting any on you. It's not worth it.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: The old man holsters his gun and removes his cufflinks. He then rolls back his sleeves to reveal his arms.
Really, Woody? At your age?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: When's the last time you saw me use my whip?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: When you sold those stockbeasts to the caravan for supplies, outside the plate... So three or four years ago?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Right. Only three or four years ago.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: I'll take care of their leaders. Can you take care of the rest?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Sure thing, leave it to me.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Make it quick... There's still time before dawn. Maybe we can catch some beauty sleep.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Too bad there ain't any trees around to hang you from. I could try it from the roof, though...
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: What's wrong? You got us surrounded, but none of you have the balls to lead the charge?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Don't get cocky, you old bastard. This show's just getting started.
attributes.name: Rude Ruffian

attributes.content: What's the word on the street? What's going on tonight?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: These are all the bandages I have left. It's not enough to wrap your head, but... press them against the wound. Helps stop the blood.
attributes.name: Panic-stricken Shop Proprietor

attributes.content: I'm fine. Just tell me what you know.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: At first, I heard some things from the east side of the plate. You know, where all the thugs gather.
attributes.name: Panic-stricken Shop Proprietor

attributes.content: They say lots of folks in town think that, since we ain't ever gonna pay the banks back... they might as well...
attributes.name: Panic-stricken Shop Proprietor

attributes.content: Might as well what?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: ...Might as well rob everyone... then flee to the frontier for a fresh start.
attributes.name: Panic-stricken Shop Proprietor

attributes.content: You saw it. It's like they all went crazy. They're beating people up, smashing up stores, stealing everything...
attributes.name: Panic-stricken Shop Proprietor

attributes.content: Wait, Leone... Look. That's... the direction of your home...
attributes.name: Panic-stricken Shop Proprietor

attributes.content: Dammit!
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Manager, I... I heard the situation outside is pretty bad.
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: Calm down, Sylvia. We're all safe here inside the bank.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: They're a despicable bunch beyond redemption, but before us and only us, they're perfect gentlemen.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: If you're afraid, get some sleep. By the time you wake up, you'll never see them again.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: What do you mean...?
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: Has no one told you? Our business partners will be here soon. Before you know it, those men will be useless to us.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Which is why when they suggested they'd leave town with some... souvenirs, we had no reason not to go along with it.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: All we have to do is wait patiently, like we've done so many times. Hold tight, and everything will be as it should be—
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Manager, I just got a transmission from Blacksteel! Their landship is arriving sooner than expected!
attributes.name: Bank Employee

attributes.content: Tsk, not only are they here, they're here sooner than we thought...
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: But it's all the same to us.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Looks like you didn't learn your lesson.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Shit... Every damn time, it's either a lesson or a warning. You ever going to fight for real?!
attributes.name: Rude Ruffian

attributes.content: My hand!
attributes.name: Rude Ruffian

attributes.content: If you're that eager to eat a bullet, I could oblige.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Left foot, or left hand? Pick one.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: You have no idea... You can chase us off today... but there's more where we came from...
attributes.name: Rude Ruffian

attributes.content: Not one of you is ever gonna get away...
attributes.name: Rude Ruffian

attributes.content: I'd worry about myself first, if I were you.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: What's that noise—?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Fire! Help—!
attributes.name: Helpless Plate Resident

attributes.content: Ma'am, is Leone still inside?!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I-I don't know. When I came out, the house was already on fire!
attributes.name: Helpless Plate Resident

attributes.content: Please make way, ma'am!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: What are you doing, girl?! You can't go inside. The fire's too strong! You won't make it back out!
attributes.name: Helpless Plate Resident

attributes.content: Ma'am, please go find more people to help fight the fire. I'll go inside to look for Leone.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Who is he to you anyway? Why put your life on the line to save him?
attributes.name: Helpless Plate Resident

attributes.content: An acquaintance. Now please, let me go!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: That's it? Not even a friend? Don't do this! Ah—
attributes.name: Helpless Plate Resident

attributes.content: Jessica, why are you here? Wh-What are you doing?
Leone?!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: So you weren't inside...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I saw it, Jessica. I saw it.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Leone, she said she was gonna run into the fire looking for you...
attributes.name: Helpless Plate Resident

attributes.content: I-I thought you—
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Don't cry, my girl. I'm doing just fine.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: B-But your house...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: It doesn't matter... It's okay... I can sleep over at Helena's.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Good thing no one else lives here. I had nothing but empty walls to look at anyway. It was suffocating... It's not so bad it got burned down.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Now... There's nothing to dwell on anymore.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: What's that noise?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: What do I do...? What do I do...?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: What do you do? I told you. It's burned down. Let it stay that way.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: What do I do... what do I do... what do I do...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: No, what do you mean, 'what do I do?' What's wrong?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Tila, I see you going in and out of Mr. Cliff's office. Did Liskarm's squad screw this up?
attributes.name: Blacksteel Senior Operator

attributes.content: No, there's an emergency situation on the plate, but they've completed their mission. The landship will connect to Davistown very soon.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Intelligence Squad Member

attributes.content: Got it. All those debtors will know better than to hang around once we're there, so—
attributes.name: Blacksteel Senior Operator

attributes.content: Watch what you say.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Intelligence Squad Member

attributes.content: Sorry, my bad.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Senior Operator

attributes.content: But what did the boss say about it? Don't tell me he had a change of heart just because people are making trouble?
attributes.name: Blacksteel Senior Operator

attributes.content: Everyone is to proceed according to plan.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Intelligence Squad Member

attributes.content: Alright—
attributes.name: Blacksteel Senior Operator

attributes.content: ...At last, looks like we're almost there.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Senior Operator

attributes.content: First, there was a strange gust causing everyone's hair to flutter.
Next, there was the rumble they felt beneath their feet.
Finally, there was a loud boom in the sky, hundreds of yards away.
Breaking through the dense fog of the winter night, Fort Barron has finally arrived after its two week journey.
Everyone is gathered on the streets or standing by the windows, watching it intently.
Whether they welcome it or reject it, it arrives.
Whether this has been a nightmare or a pleasant dream, they are all jolted awake.
Woodrow weighs the gun in his hand. He's not very pleased at being interrupted.
He looks away from the vessel in the distance to find that the man on the ground has scurried away, leaving only a long, bloody trail.
Heh... Should've shot his foot when I had the chance.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Goddammit.
attributes.name: Woodrow
